segments.text: How was your appraisal with the boss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh it was really good . Do you know , he ’ s the nicest boss I ’ Ve had here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think he ’ s the most relaxed person in management .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s more , he said I was the hardest working person in the office !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s good . Maybe you ’ ll get promoted .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope so . Then I ’ ll be the happiest person in our office too !
segments.speaker: S2
